block.p: Philippa Anne Cooper, the daughter of Marian and Dr. Thomas Cooper of Suffern, N.Y., was married yesterday to Thomas Patrick Holland, a son of Louise and Michael Holland of New Canaan, Conn. The Rev. Philippa Anne Turner, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony at the Church of the Heavenly Rest in New York.

Mrs. Holland, 30, is a senior field producer in New York for ''Moneyline,'' a financial news program on CNN. She graduated from Lake Forest College. Her father is a psychopharmacology professor at Columbia.

Philippa Anne Cooper, the daughter of Marian and Dr. Thomas Cooper of Suffern, N.Y., was married yesterday to Thomas Patrick Holland, a son of Louise and Michael Holland of New Canaan, Conn. The Rev. Philippa Anne Turner, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony at the Church of the Heavenly Rest in New York.

Mrs. Holland, 30, is a senior field producer in New York for ''Moneyline,'' a financial news program on CNN. She graduated from Lake Forest College. Her father is a psychopharmacology professor at Columbia.

Mr. Holland, 31, is a fitness trainer and health consultant in New York. He has completed three Ironman triathlons, the most recent in May. He graduated from Boston College. His father owns an investment company in New York and manages the Holland Balanced Fund, a mutual fund.
